response.overview: Anne mortgaged her house in order to give her son William a wedding, and because she couldn't pay off her debt in time, Anne's house was taken away. Anne went to find her son William, but her son's wife, Selene, drove her away. Anne saves girl Rebecca, Rebecca feels Anne's kindness, lets her and her father blind date, Anne and her father Leonardo Blind Date and success flash marriage. After her marriage, Leonardo stayed by Anne's side as she faced bullying from her son's family, relatives and ex-husband. then Leonardo is the boss of a top business empire! and Rebecca, is her long-lost biological daughter! After all this, Anne finally lived a happy life.
response.title: True Love Waits
